A.A.M.A.S.S.Perera
IT14118296
1.As an administrator i want to grant user role based access permissions to different users so that i can ensure the safety and integrity of the system.
2.As a super admin i want to view the progress of each project under each project account so that i can take further actions.
3.As a super admin i want to search account details so that i can find specific account details where necessary.
